auth.usernameInvalid: Username must contain only characters and numbers without spaces

password.invalid: Password must contain 8 or more characters with at least one of each: uppercase, lowercase, number and special
password.invalidLowercase: Password must contain at least 1 lower case letter
password.invalidUppercase: Password must contain at least 1 upper case letter
password.invalidMinNumbers: Password must contain at least 1 number
password.invalidMinSymbols: Password must contain at least 1 special character

workflow.name: Name
workflow.editGuide: Edit workflow change nodes and links, press 'Save' to update the current version, press 'Publish' to save and publish the current version
workflow.editPublishedGuide: Edit workflow change nodes and links, press 'Save' to save as a new draft version
workflow.createGuide: Create workflow with new nodes and links, press 'Create' to save the first draft version of new workflow
